name: functions
description: Cloud Functions for seeCode.run: adds, copies and authenticate pastebins. Also does backups

scripts.serve: firebase use development; cross-env NODE_ENV=development firebase serve --only functions
scripts.win-serve: firebase use development & firebase serve --only functions
scripts.serve-prod: firebase use production; cross-env NODE_ENV=development firebase serve --only functions
scripts.deploy: firebase use production; firebase deploy --only functions; firebase use default
scripts.deploy-dev: firebase use development; cross-env NODE_ENV=development firebase deploy --only functions; firebase use default
scripts.logs: firebase use production firebase functions:log; firebase use default
scripts.logs-dev: firebase use development; cross-env NODE_ENV=development firebase functions:log; firebase use default
